title: This Week in European Tech: more than €5 billion in funding, VCs starting 'fund-of-funds' becomes a trend, EU less behind on AI than feared, and more - Tech.eu
content: This Week in European Tech: more than €5 billion in funding, VCs starting 'fund-of-funds' becomes a trend, EU less behind on AI than feared, and more  Tech.eu
description: Here's a roundup of this week's biggest European Tech funding rounds, exits, 'other news' that you need to be aware of, topped off with an overview of must-read articles on all things #EUtech.
